message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and potential impact, I propose a price of $1200000 for the product. This offer includes comprehensive support and a 1-year warranty. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value and support you're providing, I'm looking for a more affordable solution. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. To find a middle ground, I would like to propose a revised price of $1000000 for the product. This still allows us to cover our costs and provides you with significant savings compared to our initial asking price. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort to meet my budgetary needs. I would like to counterpropose a price of $950000 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your considerations and allows us to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to work towards a mutually beneficial arrangement, Bob. After considering your counteroffer, I am pleased to present a revised price of $975000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that maintains a reasonable profit margin while accommodating your budget constraints. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I've reviewed your latest proposal and appreciate the effort. I would like to counteroffer at $960000 for the product. I believe this price strikes a balance between our interests and allows for a successful transaction.
